meanings.definition: A metric unit of capacity equal to 1.0567 U.S. liquid quarts
A unit of volume in the metric system, equal to 1.0567 U.S. liquid quarts
A metric unit of capacity, formerly defined as the volume of one kilogram of pure water under standard conditions, now equal to 1,000 cubic centimeters (about 1.75 U.S. pints)
